nodes.text: A settlement was located on the planet Vir Aphshire near the some hives and orchards. In 0 ABY, after the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry captured the hives and orchards from the Galactic Empire, the rebel Sergeant Fektrin scouted the settlement, and passed on his report to Captain Micha Evon through Private Hazram Namir when he returned to the company. Evon asked Namir what the private thought the 61st could do in the company's remaining time on Vir Aphshire, to which the private suggested pillaging the settlement. The captain then advised his soldier that their goal was to win over the hearts of the people.
The settlement was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
